titleStmt.title: Plain English to His Excellencie the Lord General Monck and the officers of his army, or, A word in season not onely to them but to all impartial Englishmen to which is added A declaration of Parliament in the year 1647 setting forth the grounds and reasons why they resolved to make no further address or application to the King.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons. Declaration of the Commons of England in Parliament assembled.

notesStmt.note: "A declaration of the Commons of England in Parliament assembled": p. 17-30.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
